name: Haunted Castle (Basiccomputer)
description:
Welcome to the Haunted Castle!

In this fast Pase shooting game the goal is to shoot down as
many Frankenstein's as possible within a time limit at the
bottom of the screen. Use the mouse to point at a Frankenstein
and click the left button to blast it to kingdom come. But be
warned the higher your score is the faster the timer will be
so don't blink and keep a sharp eye on Frankenstein to get
yourself a high score. This game has Variations.
GAME 1 = You see the target cursor
GAME 2 = The target cursor is invisible
CONTROLS
Mouse = Move cursor and left click to shoot
ESCAPE = Exit the Game
F1 = View Manual
F2 = Reset the game
F3 = Change game variation
F4 = Change Window Size
F5 = Save Game
F6 = Load Game
